ability: 【A】 When this card is placed into Climax slot from Hand, choose up to 1 Red card from your Waiting Room, place it to Stock, during this turn, all your Characters get +1 Soul.

name: 踏み出した一歩
flavor_text: だから！……俺を乗せてくれ！！
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Gate：When this card is Triggered, you may choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand)

name: 怪訝な表情 イクノ
flavor_text: それに、ゼロ番代コードって存在しないはずだよね
ability: 【C】 During your turn, all your other 「昂る意識 ミツル」 gets ＋2000 Power.
【A】 BOND／「昂る意識 ミツル」 ［①］ （When this card is played onto Stage, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「昂る意識 ミツル」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand）

name: 入隊式 イチゴ
flavor_text: ゴロー「イチゴ、式に集中しろ」
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, draw up to 1 card, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room.

name: 優しい気遣い ココロ
flavor_text: 変わった人だね。甘いもの好きなのかな？
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《パラサイト》 or 《フランクス》 Character, add it to Hand, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room. (If not, return revealed card to its original position)
【S】 CONCENTRATION ［① REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: 悲しみの表情 イチゴ
flavor_text: オペレーター「3・2・1　タイムアウトしました……」
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have other 《パラサイト》 or 《フランクス》 Characters, during this turn, this card gets ＋2000 Power.

name: 昂る意識 ミツル
flavor_text: 凄い！力がみなぎってなんでも出来そうだ……パートナーでこんなにも違うなんて……やっぱり僕には問題はなかった！

name: マイペース フトシ
flavor_text: えへへ、俺たち相性ばっちりだね
ability: 【S】【COUNTER】 ASSIST 3000 Level 2 ［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets +3000 Power)

name: 初出撃 ゴロー
flavor_text: もう一匹いたのかよっ！
ability: 【A】 When this card attacks, during this turn, this card gets ＋Ｘ Power. Ｘ is equal to the number of your other 《パラサイト》 or 《フランクス》 Character ×1000.

【A】 ENCORE ［Place 1 《パラサイト》 or 《フランクス》 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ （When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay this Cost. If you do, place this card in its previous slot in REST）

name: 13部隊のリーダー イチゴ
flavor_text: ヒロはここに残ることになったんだから、堂々としてればいいんだよ
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, look up to Ｘ cards from your top Deck, choose up to 1 card, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room. Ｘ is equal to the number of your 《パラサイト》 or 《フランクス》 Character.
【A】 When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more other 《パラサイト》 or 《フランクス》 Characters, choose 1 of your Character, during this turn, it gets ＋1000 Power and ＋1 Soul.

name: 寄宿舎の朝
flavor_text: にゃにゃー？お前はこのへんの子なのかにゃ〜〜？
ability: Look at up to 4 cards from your top Deck, choose up to 1 《パラサイト》 or 《フランクス》 Character and show it to opponent, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room.

name: 入隊の儀式
flavor_text: 議長「命を燃やせ。その血、最期の一滴まで！！」
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +2 Soul.
